title: 2018 Week 2 Preview
itunes:title: 2018 Week 2 Preview
description:
In a room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Marc Sessler & Chris Wesseling – bring you an exciting Thursday Night Football recap of the Ravens loss (spoiler alert!!) against the Bengals (00:28) before jumping into a preview of all of the week two games. Marc Sessler sprinkles in an odd read that leaves the room perplexed (46:10), and we take a trip down to the lab over Jay Gruden and Kirk Cousins. (50:28)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
